entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:24 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
